name: Sotidrokhima (itch)
description:
Sotidrokhima is a top-down hack-n-slash with first-person elements. The game is set in a medieval Finland, where the titular protagonist must prepare for a foreign invasion while simultaneously confronting his mysterious heritage.

Fight hordes of enemies as you gain renown - expanding your game experience and gifting you with powerful new weapons, ultimately turning you into a feared warrior whom your enemies run from in terror.

  • top-down and first-person action
  • Renown mechanic: the better you perform in battles, the more renown you gain, gifting you additional weapons, secret dialogue and story scenes, and making enemies fear you
  • five minigames to improve your character and gain bonus Renown
  • voice-acted, full-length story
  • customizable difficulty to add replayability - including Permadeath
  • blood. And lots of it!
